inputColumn.comments: Number of the period, on 4 digits (ex: 0019).
- Always empty for the AFDB_BTIC-NETWORK* files - Site identifier for the AFDB_BTIC-SITES* files - GU identifier for the AFDB_BTIC-GU* files - Identifier of Contact Center for the AFDB_BTIC-CC* files

Average number of concurrent calls during the elementary period. The simultaneity is estimated per second. The calls taken into account are the calls which have started during the day (of this period).
Maximum number of concurrent calls during the elementary period.
